title: Digital India Programme
summary: Transform India into a digitally empowered society and knowledge economy.
details: Launched to ensure government services are made available to citizens electronically by improving online infrastructure and internet connectivity.

title: National Education Policy 2020
summary: Overhauls Indian education to suit 21st-century needs.
details: Introduces multidisciplinary learning, local language instruction, coding from grade 6, and a new curricular structure (5+3+3+4).

title: Ayushman Bharat Yojana
summary: World’s largest health insurance scheme for poor and vulnerable families.
details: Provides ₹5 lakh per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization under PM-JAY.

title: Make in India
summary: Encourages companies to manufacture in India and incentivizes dedicated investments.
details: Targets 25 sectors of the economy like electronics, defense, railways, textiles to boost domestic manufacturing.

title: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao
summary: Addresses the declining child sex ratio and promotes girl education.
details: Multi-sectoral action plan across 100 gender-critical districts in India involving the Ministry of Women & Child Development, Health, and Education.

title: Startup India
summary: Supports startups through tax benefits, easier compliance, and funding.
details: Provides DPIIT recognition, 3-year tax exemption, faster patent examination and fund-of-funds for startups.

title: Swachh Bharat Mission
summary: Aims to eliminate open defecation and improve solid waste management.
details: Divided into Swachh Bharat (Urban) and Swachh Bharat (Gramin) with targets for building toilets and waste processing units.

title: PM-Kisan Samman Nidhi
summary: Provides income support to all landholding farmer families.
details: ₹6,000 per year is transferred directly to bank accounts of eligible farmers in 3 equal installments.

title: National Policy on Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
summary: Develops workforce through skill training and entrepreneurship support.
details: Focuses on upskilling youth through National Skill Development Corporation and Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY).

title: Atal Mission for Rejuvenation and Urban Transformation (AMRUT)
summary: Provides basic urban infrastructure to improve quality of life.
details: Focuses on water supply, sewerage, stormwater drainage, urban transport and green spaces in 500 cities.
